CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic devices with PC71BM as an acceptor showed higher EQE values than those with PC61BM as an acceptor , although they absorbed photons in the same range of the solar spectra.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM |
| PC61BM |

In this case, the entities are:

* PC71BM
* PC61BM

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "The" (it is a common article that does not provide any meaningful information)
* "photovoltaic devices" (it is a general term that refers to a broader category of devices, rather than a specific material name)
* "absorbed photons" (it is a general term that refers to the process of absorbing light, rather than a specific material name)

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic devices with PC71BM as an acceptor showed higher EQE values than those with PC61BM as an acceptor , although they absorbed photons in the same range of the solar spectra.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| EQE (Efficiency of Quantum Efficiency) |
| PC71BM (Polymeric acceptor) |
| PC61BM (Polymeric acceptor) |

In this paragraph, the following entities are mentioned:

* EQE (Efficiency of Quantum Efficiency): This is the measure of the efficiency of the photovoltaic devices in converting incoming photons into electrical energy.
* PC71BM: This is the name of the polymeric acceptor used in the photovoltaic devices.
* PC61BM: This is also the name of a polymeric acceptor used in the photovoltaic devices, which is different from PC71BM.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid entities that refer to "Value of material property" in the paragraph:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| EQE (Efficiency of Quantum Efficiency) |

In this paragraph, the only entity that refers to a value of a material property is "EQE (Efficiency of Quantum Efficiency)".
